title: How much money do singers (Taylor Swift) make per concert? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very broad question is though easy enough to broadly answer. First things first, I won’t take into account the agent, lawyer, or management fees. That’ll be too hard to explain as agents, lawyers and managers all get different rates and fees depending on the job they did for securing the concert. For a one-off show or a concert where the artist doesn’t do surrounding shows in the vicinity, a singer will usually go for an Artist Guarantee of at least 60% of the Gross Revenues of the show. Rarely will they do % of the gate if it’s a one-off show in a market they are not familiar with or with a promoter they aren’t familiar with. So if the promoter or venue predicts to make $1M USD, the artist should be looking for at least a $600k guarantee paid before the show happens.
Here is the starting point for how much each of the following artists starts at. Taylor Swift starts at one million dollars and goes up from there:
